trans-unit.source: ansible_env: is normally populated by fact gathering (M(gather_facts)) and the value of the variables depends on the user that did the gathering action. If you change remote_user/become_user you might end up using the wrong values for those variables.

trans-unit.source: ansible_play_batch is available as a list of hostnames that are in scope for the current ‘batch’ of the play. The batch size is defined by serial, when not set it is equivalent to the whole play (making it the same as ansible_play_hosts).
trans-unit.target: ansible_play_batch 可以作为主机名的列表使用，这些主机名在播放的当前“批处理”范围内。批处理大小由 serial 定义，如果未设置，则等于整个播放（使其与 ansible_play_hosts 相同）。

trans-unit.source: ansible_play_hosts is the full list of all hosts still active in the current play.
trans-unit.target: ansible_play_hosts 是当前播放中仍处于活动状态的所有主机的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: ansible_port: The port WinRM will run over, HTTPS is 5986 which is the default while HTTP is 5985
trans-unit.target: ansible_port ：WinRM将运行的端口，HTTPS是 5986 ，这是默认值，而HTTP是 5985

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_*: Any additional keyword arguments supported by winrm.Protocol may be provided in place of *
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_* ：可以提供 winrm.Protocol 支持的任何其他关键字参数来代替 *

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_ca_trust_path: Used to specify a different cacert container than the one used in the certifi module. See the HTTPS Certificate Validation section for more details.
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_ca_trust_path ：用于指定与 certifi 模块中使用的容器不同的cacert容器。有关更多详细信息，请参见HTTPS证书验证部分。

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_message_encryption is different from transport encryption done over TLS. The WinRM payload is still encrypted with TLS when run over HTTPS, even if ansible_winrm_message_encryption=never.
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_message_encryption 与通过TLS完成的传输加密不同。即使通过 ansible_winrm_message_encryption=never ，通过HTTPS运行时，WinRM有效负载仍将使用TLS进行加密。

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_message_encryption: Specify the message encryption operation (auto, always, never) to use, Ansible uses auto by default. auto means message encryption is only used when ansible_winrm_scheme is http and ansible_winrm_transport supports message encryption. always means message encryption will always be used and never means message encryption will never be used
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_message_encryption ：指定要使用的消息加密操作（ auto ， always ， never ），Ansible 默认使用 auto 。 auto 表示仅在 ansible_winrm_scheme 为 http 并且 ansible_winrm_transport 支持消息加密时才使用消息加密。 always 意味着将始终使用消息加密，并且 never 意味着将不再使用消息加密

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_operation_timeout_sec: Increase the default timeout for WinRM operations, Ansible uses 20 by default
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_operation_timeout_sec ：增加WinRM操作的默认超时，Ansible 默认使用 20

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_path: Specify an alternate path to the WinRM endpoint, Ansible uses /wsman by default
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_path ：指定WinRM端点的备用路径，Ansible 默认使用 /wsman

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_read_timeout_sec: Increase the WinRM read timeout, Ansible uses 30 by default. Useful if there are intermittent network issues and read timeout errors keep occurring
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_read_timeout_sec ：增加WinRM读取超时，Ansible 默认使用 30 。如果存在间歇性网络问题并且持续发生读取超时错误，则很有用

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_realm: Specify the realm to use for Kerberos authentication. If ansible_user contains @, Ansible will use the part of the username after @ by default
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_realm ：指定用于Kerberos身份验证的领域。如果 ansible_user 包含 @ ，则默认情况下，Ansible将使用用户名中 @ 之后的部分

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_scheme: Specify the connection scheme (http or https) to use for the WinRM connection. Ansible uses https by default unless ansible_port is 5985
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_scheme ：指定用于WinRM连接的连接方案（ http 或 https ）。除非 ansible_port 为 5985 ,否则Ansible默认使用 https

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_send_cbt: When using ntlm or kerberos over HTTPS, the authentication library will try to send channel binding tokens to mitigate against man in the middle attacks. This flag controls whether these bindings will be sent or not (default: yes).
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_send_cbt ：在HTTPS上使用 ntlm 或 kerberos 时，身份验证库将尝试发送通道绑定令牌以减轻中间攻击的威胁。该标志控制是否发送这些绑定（默认值： yes ）。

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_server_cert_validation: Specify the server certificate validation mode (ignore or validate). Ansible defaults to validate on Python 2.7.9 and higher, which will result in certificate validation errors against the Windows self-signed certificates. Unless verifiable certificates have been configured on the WinRM listeners, this should be set to ignore
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_server_cert_validation ：指定服务器证书验证模式（ ignore 或 validate ）。Ansible默认在Python 2.7.9及更高版本上进行 validate ，这将导致针对Windows自签名证书的证书验证错误。除非已在WinRM侦听器上配置了可验证的证书，否则应将其设置为 ignore

trans-unit.source: ansible_winrm_transport: Specify one or more authentication transport options as a comma-separated list. By default, Ansible will use kerberos, basic if the kerberos module is installed and a realm is defined, otherwise it will be plaintext
trans-unit.target: ansible_winrm_transport ：将一个或多个身份验证传输选项指定为以逗号分隔的列表。默认情况下，如果已安装 kerberos 模块并定义了领域，则Ansible将使用 kerberos, basic 。否则为 plaintext

trans-unit.source: config defines the resource configuration data model as key-value pairs. The type of the config option can be dict or list of dict based on the resource managed. That is, if the device has a single global configuration, it should be a dict (for example, a global LLDP configuration). If the device has multiple instances of configuration, it should be of type list with each element in the list of type dict (for example, interfaces configuration).
trans-unit.target: config 将资源配置数据模型定义为键值对。 config 选项的类型可以是 dict 或基于托管资源 list of dict 。也就是说，如果设备具有单个全局配置，则它应该是 dict （例如，全局LLDP配置）。如果设备具有多个配置实例，则它应该是 list 类型，列表中的每个元素都属于 dict 类型（例如，接口配置）。

trans-unit.source: dump requires a target definition to which the database will be backed up. (Added in Ansible 2.4) Note that in some PostgreSQL versions of pg_dump, which is an embedded PostgreSQL utility and is used by the module, returns rc 0 even when errors occurred (e.g. the connection is forbidden by pg_hba.conf, etc.), so the module returns changed=True but the dump has not actually been done. Please, be sure that your version of pg_dump returns rc 1 in this case.
trans-unit.target: dump 需要将数据库备份到的目标定义。（在Ansible 2.4中添加）请注意，在某些PostgreSQL版本的pg_dump（它是嵌入式PostgreSQL实用程序，由模块使用）中，即使发生错误（例如，pg_hba.conf禁止连接），也返回rc 0，因此该模块返回changed = True，但转储实际上尚未完成。请确保在这种情况下，您的pg_dump版本返回rc 1。

trans-unit.source: inventory_hostname is the name of the hostname as configured in Ansible’s inventory host file. This can be useful when you’ve disabled fact-gathering, or you don’t want to rely on the discovered hostname ansible_hostname. If you have a long FQDN, you can use inventory_hostname_short, which contains the part up to the first period, without the rest of the domain.

trans-unit.source: ipaddr() is a Jinja2 filter designed to provide an interface to the netaddr Python package from within Ansible. It can operate on strings or lists of items, test various data to check if they are valid IP addresses, and manipulate the input data to extract requested information. ipaddr() works with both IPv4 and IPv6 addresses in various forms. There are also additional functions available to manipulate IP subnets and MAC addresses.
trans-unit.target: ipaddr() 是一个Jinja2过滤器，旨在从Ansible中提供与netaddr Python软件包的接口。它可以对字符串或项目列表进行操作，测试各种数据以检查它们是否为有效的IP地址，并操纵输入数据以提取请求的信息。 ipaddr() 可以使用各种形式的IPv4和IPv6地址。还有其他功能可用于操作IP子网和MAC地址。

trans-unit.source: ipaddr() is designed to return the input value if a query is True, and False if a query is False. This way it can be easily used in chained filters. To use the filter, pass a string to it:
trans-unit.target: ipaddr() 用于返回输入值如果查询是真的， False 如果查询是假。这样，它可以很容易地在链式过滤器中使用。要使用过滤器，请向其传递一个字符串：

trans-unit.source: match succeeds if it finds the pattern at the beginning of the string, while search succeeds if it finds the pattern anywhere within string. By default, regex works like search, but regex can be configured to perform other tests as well, by passing the match_type keyword argument. In particular, match_type determines the re method that gets used to perform the search. The full list can be found in the relevant Python documentation here.
trans-unit.target: match 如果在字符串的开头找到模式，则match成功，而如果在字符串中的任意位置找到模式，则 search 成功。默认情况下， regex 工作方式类似于 search ，但可以通过传递 match_type 关键字参数将 regex 配置为执行其他测试。特别是， match_type 确定用于执行搜索的 re 方法。完整列表可在此处的相关Python文档中找到。

trans-unit.source: netcredentials_only: The process will use the same token as the caller but will use the become_user and become_password when accessing a remote resource. This is useful in inter-domain scenarios where there is no trust relationship, and should be used with the new_credentialslogon_type.
trans-unit.target: netcredentials_only ：该过程将使用与调用方相同的令牌，但在访问远程资源时将使用 become_user 和 become_password 。这在没有信任关系的域间方案中很有用，应与 new_credentials logon_type 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: netmask - Subnet mask in case of static boot protocol is used.
trans-unit.target: netmask -使用静态启动协议时的子网掩码。

trans-unit.source: network: Runs the process under a network context without any cached credentials. This results in the same type of logon session as running a normal WinRM process without credential delegation, and operates under the same restrictions.
trans-unit.target: network ：在没有任何缓存凭据的网络上下文下运行进程。这导致与运行常规WinRM进程而没有凭据委派的登录会话类型相同，并且在相同的限制下运行。

trans-unit.source: network_cleartext: Like the network logon type, but instead caches the credentials so it can access network resources. This is the same type of logon session as running a normal WinRM process with credential delegation.
trans-unit.target: network_cleartext ：与 network 登录类型类似，但是会缓存凭据，以便它可以访问网络资源。这与运行具有凭据委派的普通WinRM进程的登录会话类型相同。

trans-unit.source: network_os - set to match your network platform you are communicating with. See the platform-specific pages.
trans-unit.target: network_os -设置为与要与之通信的网络平台匹配。请参阅特定于平台的页面。

trans-unit.source: network_os: myos
trans-unit.target: network_os ：myos

trans-unit.source: never - Nothing is filtered, always obey metadata_expire.
trans-unit.target: never -不进行任何过滤，始终遵循metadata_expire。

trans-unit.source: never disables any encryption checks that are in place when running over HTTP and disables any authentication encryption processes.
trans-unit.target: never 禁用通过HTTP运行时进行的任何加密检查，也不会禁用任何身份验证加密过程。

trans-unit.source: never will not request a certificate from the server so no validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: never 不会从服务器请求证书，因此不会进行验证。

trans-unit.source: new_credentials: Runs under the same credentials as the calling user, but outbound connections are run under the context of the become_user and become_password, similar to runas.exe /netonly. The logon_flags flag should also be set to netcredentials_only. Use this flag if the process needs to access a network resource (like an SMB share) using a different set of credentials.
trans-unit.target: new_credentials ：在与调用用户相同的凭据下运行，但是出站连接在 become_user 和 become_password 的上下文中运行，类似于 runas.exe /netonly 。该 logon_flags 标记也应被设置为 netcredentials_only 。如果进程需要使用一组不同的凭据访问网络资源（如SMB共享），请使用此标志。

trans-unit.target: newline_sequence （str）：指定用于模板文件的换行序列。有效选择为“ \ n”，“ \ r”，“ \ r \ n”。默认值“ \ n”。

The existing data in the publications that are being subscribed to should be copied once the replication starts.

trans-unit.source: refresh_inventory (added in Ansible 2.0) forces the reload of the inventory, which in the case of dynamic inventory scripts means they will be re-executed. If the dynamic inventory script is using a cache, Ansible cannot know this and has no way of refreshing it (you can disable the cache or, if available for your specific inventory datasource (e.g. aws), you can use the an inventory plugin instead of an inventory script). This is mainly useful when additional hosts are created and users wish to use them instead of using the add_host module.
trans-unit.target: refresh_inventory （在Ansible 2.0中添加了）会强制重新加载清单，这在动态清单脚本的情况下意味着它们将被重新执行。如果动态清单脚本正在使用缓存，则Ansible无法知道并且无法刷新它（您可以禁用缓存，或者，如果可用于特定清单数据源（例如aws），则可以使用清单插件代替广告资源脚本）。这在创建其他主机并且用户希望使用它们而不是使用add_host模块时非常有用。

This is mainly useful when additional hosts are created and users wish to use them instead of using the ansible.builtin.add_host module.

trans-unit.source: started/stopped are idempotent actions that will not run commands unless necessary. restarted will always bounce the service (sv restart) and killed will always bounce the service (sv force-stop). reloaded will send a HUP (sv reload). once will run a normally downed sv once (sv once), not really an idempotent operation.
trans-unit.target: started / stopped 是幂等操作，除非必要，否则将不会运行命令。 restarted 将始终反弹服务（sv重新启动），而 killed 将始终反弹服务（sv强制停止）。 reloaded 将发送HUP（SV重新加载）。 once 将运行通常关闭的sv一次（sv一次），而不是真正的幂等操作。

trans-unit.source: started/stopped are idempotent actions that will not run commands unless necessary. restarted will always bounce the service. reloaded will always reload.

trans-unit.source: started/stopped are idempotent actions that will not run commands unless necessary. restarted will always bounce the service. reloaded will send a SIGHUP or start the service. reset will start or stop the service according to whether it is enabled or not.
trans-unit.target: started / stopped 是幂等操作，除非必要，否则将不会运行命令。 restarted 将始终弹跳服务。 reloaded 将发送SIGHUP或启动服务。 reset 将根据服务是否启用来启动或停止该服务。

trans-unit.source: started/stopped are idempotent actions that will not run commands unless necessary. Not all init scripts support restarted nor reloaded natively, so these will both trigger a stop and start as needed.
trans-unit.target: started / stopped 是幂等操作，除非必要，否则将不会运行命令。并非所有初始化脚本都支持本地 restarted 或 reloaded ，因此它们都会触发停止并根据需要启动。

trans-unit.source: present - Asserts the existence of a container matching the name and any provided configuration parameters. If no container matches the name, a container will be created. If a container matches the name but the provided configuration does not match, the container will be updated, if it can be. If it cannot be updated, it will be removed and re-created with the requested config. Image version will be taken into account when comparing configuration. Use the recreate option to force the re-creation of the matching container.
trans-unit.target: 本-断言匹配名称的容器和任何提供的配置参数的存在。如果没有与名称匹配的容器，则将创建一个容器。如果容器与名称匹配，但提供的配置不匹配，则将对其进行更新（如果可以）。如果无法更新，它将被删除并使用请求的配置重新创建。比较配置时将考虑映像版本。使用recreate选项强制重新创建匹配的容器。

trans-unit.source: started - Asserts there is a running container matching the name and any provided configuration. If no container matches the name, a container will be created and started. Use recreate to always re-create a matching container, even if it is running. Use force_restart to force a matching container to be stopped and restarted.
trans-unit.target: 已开始-断言正在运行的容器与名称和任何提供的配置相匹配。如果没有与名称匹配的容器，则将创建并启动一个容器。使用recreate可以始终重新创建匹配的容器，即使该容器正在运行。使用force_restart强制停止匹配的容器并重新启动。
